mapper.select: select tt.id, tt.name, tt.color from t_tag tt left join t_article_tag tat on tt.id = tat.tag_id where tat.article_id = #{articleId}

select tt.id, tt.name, tt.color, count(ta.id) articleCount from t_tag tt left join t_article_tag tat on tt.id = tat.tag_id left join t_article ta on ta.id = tat.article_id where ta.status = 2 group by tt.id
